page.title: Import tasks
page.description: Import your tasks and projects from other platforms. Select a platform below to get started.

platforms.todoist: Import tasks from Todoist CSV export
platforms.ticktick: Import tasks from TickTick CSV export
platforms.vikunja: Import projects and tasks from Vikunja JSON export
platforms.trello: Import boards and cards from Trello JSON export
platforms.asana: Import projects and tasks from Asana CSV export

common.uploadDragDrop: Click to upload or drag and drop
common.statusMappingDescription: Map source statuses to your project's task statuses.

todoist.title: Import from Todoist
todoist.description: Import tasks from a Todoist CSV export.
todoist.uploadDescription: Export your tasks from Todoist as CSV and paste or upload the content here.
todoist.stepUploadDescription: Upload your Todoist CSV export file or paste the content.
todoist.stepConfigureDescription: Map Todoist sections to project statuses.
todoist.csvPlaceholder: Paste your Todoist CSV export here...
todoist.noSectionsFound: No sections found in the CSV
todoist.sectionMapping: Map Todoist sections to task statuses
todoist.mapSectionsDescription: Choose which project status each Todoist section should map to.

ticktick.title: Import from TickTick
ticktick.description: Import tasks from a TickTick CSV export.
ticktick.uploadDescription: Export your tasks from TickTick as CSV and paste or upload the content here.
ticktick.stepUploadDescription: Upload your TickTick CSV export file or paste the content.
ticktick.stepSelectListDescription: Select which list to import from and where to import to.
ticktick.stepConfigureDescription: Map TickTick columns to project statuses.
ticktick.csvPlaceholder: Paste your TickTick CSV export here...
ticktick.noListsFound: No lists with tasks found in the export
ticktick.columnMapping: Map TickTick columns to task statuses
ticktick.mapColumnsDescription: Choose which project status each TickTick column should map to.

vikunja.title: Import from Vikunja
vikunja.description: Import tasks from a Vikunja JSON export.
vikunja.uploadDescription: Export your data from Vikunja as JSON (data.json) and paste or upload the content here.
vikunja.stepUploadDescription: Upload the data.json file from your Vikunja backup (unzip the backup first).
vikunja.stepSelectProjectDescription: Select which project to import from and where to import to.
vikunja.stepConfigureDescription: Map Vikunja buckets to project statuses.
vikunja.jsonPlaceholder: Paste your Vikunja data.json export here...
vikunja.uploadHint: Found in your unzipped Vikunja backup
vikunja.noProjectsFound: No projects with tasks found in the export
vikunja.bucketMapping: Map Vikunja buckets to task statuses
vikunja.mapBucketsDescription: Choose which project status each Vikunja bucket should map to.
